title: $:/plugins/dyp/copy-title-text

description: 复制当前条目标题内容
author: dyp
text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/core/images/copy-text":{"title":"$:/core/images/copy-text","created":"20240415062817395","modified":"20240415062949626","tags":"$:/tags/Image 图标 复制内容","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/core/images/copy-title":{"title":"$:/core/images/copy-title","created":"20250506105721101","modified":"20250506105745781","tags":"$:/tags/Image 图标 复制内容","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/copy-text":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/copy-text","caption":"{{$:/core/images/copy-text}} 复制当前条目内容","created":"20240415063101707","description":"复制当前条目内容","icon":"$:/core/images/copy-text","modified":"20240417013225162","tags":"按钮 $:/tags/ViewToolbar 复制内容","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible " tooltip="复制当前条目内容" message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!text}}> <$list filter="[match[yes]]">{{$:/core/images/copy-text}}<$list filter="[match[yes]]">复制当前条目内容 "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/copy-title":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/copy-title","caption":"{{$:/core/images/copy-title}} 复制当前条目标题","created":"20250506105801707","description":"复制当前条目标题","icon":"$:/core/images/copy-title","modified":"20250506110120193","tags":"按钮 $:/tags/ViewToolbar 复制内容","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible " tooltip="复制当前条目标题" message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!title}}> <$list filter="[match[yes]]">{{$:/core/images/copy-title}}<$list filter="[match[yes]]">复制当前条目标题 "},"$:/plugins/dyp/copy-title-text/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/copy-title-text/readme","created":"20250506110849769","modified":"20250506110915217","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 两个小按钮，复制当前条目标题内容"}}}
